sentence:
• Shares of Twitter, Inc. ( TWTR ) fell 5.1% after salesforce.com, inc. ( CRM ) announced that it will refrain from bidding for Twitter
• HP Inc's ( HPQ ) shares decreased 4.4% after the company forecasted that midpoint of its 2017 earnings per share range will be at $1.60, lower than the current Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.61
• Shares of PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. ( PNC ) advanced 0.1% after reporting third-quarter earnings per share of $1.84, beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.78
• Pepsico, Inc. ( PEP ) shares increased 0.9% on news that the company plans to acquire sparkling probiotic U.S. drinks company KeVita
